entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Doaktown 5:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: NNE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
